title: HMD Global rolls out Android 12 update to the Nokia G10, G20, and Nokia 2.4
content:
Android 12 has now been out for a while, and Android 13 is just around the corner. Most flagship and mid-range smartphones that are eligible for the Android 12 update from their respective manufacturers have received the new software. However, there are still many devices for which the update hasnâ€™t rolled out yet, particularly some

The post HMD Global rolls out Android 12 update to the Nokia G10, G20, and Nokia 2.4 appeared first on XDA.
description: HMD Global has officially started rolling out the stable Android 12 update for the Nokia G10, G20, and the Nokia 2.4 across the world.
